title: Trump: India and Pakistan agree to 'full and immediate ceasefire.'
shortDescription: Trump made the announcement on Saturday on Truth Social that India and Pakistan were agreeing to a ceasefire.

title: Rep. Marjorie Taylor Greene says she won't run for Georgia Senate seat
shortDescription: Greene disputed claims by GOP "elites" that she can't beat Democratic Sen. Jon Ossoff but said she prefers staying in the House to fight for Trump

title: Trump fires long-term Librarian of Congress over DEI concerns
shortDescription: Carla Hayden has championed books by diverse authors. 'We felt she did not fit the needs of the American people,' White House spokeswoman said.

title: President Trump suggests lowering tariffs on China
shortDescription: In a social media post, President Donald Trump suggested lowering tariffs on China from 145% to 80% ahead of trade negotiations.

title: What are Trump's approval ratings the first week of May?
shortDescription: As the first full week of May ends, Trump is still slogging through low approval ratings that hover around historically low benchmarks.

title: Is Trump favoring British cars over US automakers?
shortDescription: US automakers complain a trade deal Trump negotiated with London resulted in lower fees than those for cars or parts made in Canada and Mexico.

title: Trump fires head of Library of Congress via email
shortDescription: The White House said DEI was the reason for firing Carla Hayden, the first Black person and first female Librarian of Congress.

title: Trump suggests cutting China tariffs to 80% before trade talks
shortDescription: Trump proposed to lower tariffs on Chinese imports to 80% from 145% on eve of negotiations with the country's third-largest trading partner.

title: Trump OKs 'tiny' tax hike on rich as GOP hash out his 'big beautiful bill'
shortDescription: Trump said he could accept higher taxes on the rich – a reversal from his previous opposition. 'Republicans should probably not do it, but I’m OK if they do!!!'

title: David Souter, former GOP Supreme Court justice who sided with liberals, dies
shortDescription: An intensely private man, former Supreme Court Justice David Souter often sided with liberals despite being nominated by a Republican president.

title: Trump appoints Jeanine Pirro as interim U.S. Attorney for DC
shortDescription: President Donald Trump appointed Jeanine Pirro as the interim U.S. Attorney for Washington D.C. after withdrawing the nomination of Ed Martin.

title: Trump budget cuts target satellites, sea turtles and more
shortDescription: A look at where the Trump budget proposes to cut environmental programs by more than $32 billion.

title: Trump wants a 'beautiful bill' to cut taxes. Will GOP allies complicate that?
shortDescription: Republicans are outlining their must-haves in the sprawling bill of President Donald Trump's priorities, and many of them are at odds with each other.
